data.actual_result: You will be redirected to a blank page which you cannot close down unless you restart your Discord application.
data.expected_result: It should take you to a login page.
data.short_description: If you double tap add new connection it will redirect you to a blank page and force you restart Discord.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to settings - Click on connections - Go to add new connection. - Double tap really fast on any new connection. - Now you will be redirected to a blank page.
